text: Gustavo Biosca Pagés (29 February 1928 – 1 November 2014) was a Spanish football player and manager. Biosca played as a defender for España Industrial, Barcelona and Condal. He was born in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Catalonia, Spain. He made his international debut for Spain in 1951, earning a total of 11 caps, including 2 in FIFA World Cup qualifying matches. As a coach he managed Pontevedra, Sant Andreu, Real Valladolid, Sabadell, the Spanish under-21 national team and Terrassa. Biosca died on 1 November 2014, at the age of 86 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:Spanish football managers
title: Gustau Biosca
